description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Y4ajp13ACVnzaS5s]{Drone Chassis}

Reinforced to shrug off falling debris and rescue cave-in victims, the tunnel drone uses a combination of digging apparatuses, sensors, and heavy limbs to detect, access, and (if necessary) subdue subterranean objectives.

Initial Mods

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.rDCdrOBeaaeFLjmg]{Enhanced Senses (Ex; Drone)}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.wplRejRiHGZjLEQo]{Excavator (Ex)}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.jhrcNqb8XKqUYp7P]{Melee Weapon Arm (Ex)}
